answers.answer: Hello,In your case, polyneuropathy can be responsible for erectile dysfunction. When blood vessels and nerves which control erection, are damaged, they do not communicate properly and the blood flow to penis tissue is impaired. This causes erectile dysfunction. Drugs like sildenaphil citrate may help but must be taken under medical supervision.It is not safe to use penile rings because they may cause trauma to the penis.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

question: I am a 48 year old male and have had diabetes for 19 years. I have poly neuropathy and autonomic neuropathy. I have difficulty ejaculating and usually by the time I am ready to ejaculate my erection begins to wane. Can I use a penise ring with these medical conditions?
title: Penise ring
